DOC.brief_summary: The aim study examine effect cognitive behavior therapy ( CBT ) procrastination , investigate whether delivered via Internet . Two treatment group use , one therapist contact one without , well wait-list control group . It assume treatment group therapist contact superior treatment group receive therapist contact since procrastination partially explain self-regulatory failure . Both treatment group presume superior wait-list control .
DOC.brief_title: Internet Based Cognitive Behavior Therapy Procrastination : A Randomized Controlled Trial
DOC.criteria: Primary difficulty cause chronic severe procrastination Swedish residency Fluent Swedish Computer internet access Ongoing psychotherapy Ongoing psychotropic medication ( unless stabilize three month ) Severe depression ( > 30 point MADRSS ) Suicidal ideation Misuse drug alcohol Bipolar disorder Schizophrenia psychosis
